release.action: When using an XCS that is referenced by a URI to a server, if the server could not be reached it would appear that the TBX file was in conformance to the XCS. Now any IOExceptions occur in getting the XCS will not display that the TBX is valid.
Removed deprecated versions of TBX and XCS DTD files, and replaced them with the current versions of each.
Null pointer exception occuring with an invalid TBX file.
The XCS contents datatype attribute was implied, but a default value was not available. Now the default datatype is basicType.
